name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube Monetization & RPM Checker by TubeLab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check if any YouTube Channel, Video or Short is Monetized!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds an icon to YouTube's UI informing if the channel,  video or short is monetized.
Adds RPM & Revenue estimation for videos.

How does the monetization checker work?
- It checks that the channel or video has traces of a monetized content such as: videos with custom ads, enough subscribers and sponsored content, and more.

How does the RPM & Revenue prediction work?
We have a source of 100+ niches RPMs which we semantically match to the video title.
Then we calculate the RPM based on that niche RPM, the video duration and audience.
The revenue is the RPM*Views / 1000.

This is by far the most accurate YouTube revenue prediction available!

Notes:
-  This does NOT check monetization with 100% accuracy.
-  Revenue estimation is NOT 100% accurate.
- Shorts only channels are less accurate but should work.
- Sometimes it will require a page refresh due to YouTube's UI layout shifts.

If you see any issues please contact@tubelab.net.

Developed by TubeLab
